Key Match Events: The Chicago Bulls allowed the Utah Jazz to score 135 points on Monday night.
Post-Match Reflections: Josh Giddey said the team's defense needs to be a collective unit and that they will continue to harp on that.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Bulls have only held a team to under 120 points twice this season.
Others: The Bulls are currently 3-4 and in the sixth seed in the early season.
